AgentCardTitle: Click to view details of {{ title }}
LinkCardTitle: Click to view details of "{{ title }}" on a separate page.
ヘッダの表示・非表示を切り替えます: Toggles between showing and hiding the header
サイドバーの表示・非表示を切り替えます: Toggles the sidebar between visible and invisible
キャラクターの表示・非表示を切り替えます: Toggles between showing and hiding the character
救助活動の経過時間を表します: Indicates the elapsed time of the rescue operation
市民の負傷度合いによってスコアが減算されます: Scores are subtracted according to the degree of injury to the civilian.
多くの市民が取り残されている: Many civilian are being left behind.
市民やロボットが使用する通路: Passages used by civilians and robots
RoboCup Rescue Simulation(RRS)とは都市直下型地震で: RoboCup Rescue Simulation (RRS) is a disaster rescue simulation in a virtual city hit by an earthquake directly under the city. Participants compete to see how well they can minimize the damage caused by the disaster through cooperative rescue activities by multiple types of robots.
目標は高いスコアを維持すること: Goal is to maintain high scores
被害状況が悪化するとスコア(都市の価値)が減少します。: As the damage worsens, the score (value of the city) decreases.
避難する市⺠を多く救助しよう: Rescue as many evacuees as possible
人工知能ロボットは互いに通信・協力しながら最適な災害救助活動を目指します。: Artificial intelligence robots communicate and cooperate with each other to optimize disaster relief efforts.
自力で動けない市民を避難所まで搬送: Transport civilians who cannot move on their own to evacuation centers
自力で動けない市民を避難所まで搬送します。白色で表示されます。: Transports civilians who are unable to move on their own to evacuation centers. The color is displayed in white.
建物に埋まってしまって動けない市民と人工知能ロボットを救出: Rescuing civilians and artificially intelligent robots stuck in buildings
市民は避難所に着くことを目指します。緑色で表示されます。: Civilians aim to reach the shelter. They are indicated in green.
自力で避難所まで向かう: Go to the shelter on your own.
通路を塞ぎ、市民やロボットの通行の妨げとなる: Blocking aisles and obstructing the passage of citizens and robots.
市民には負傷度があります。負傷度は色の変化によって見ることができます。: Citizens have an injury level. Injury level can be seen by a change in color.
負傷度が高いほど緑色から黒色へ近づきます。: The higher the degree of injury, the more it approaches green to black.
負傷度により色の変化を表した画像: Image showing color changes according to the degree of injury
